strings.Value: "Sarenrae's loyal servant was captured â€” and the goddess left him to the mercy of fate. Are gods of light as kind as their priests say? Or did she reject him as Torag rejected me."
"Loving parents don't solve all their children's problems. They teach them to do it themselves. That is what Torag wanted, and for that, you rejected him. Not the other way around."
"I don't understand. If he served some mysterious dark power, why didn't Sarenrae take away his magic?"
"Is that surprise I hear in your voice? You must know little of this goddess, aside from rumors."
"Is that surprise I hear in your voice? You must know little of this goddess, aside from rumors."
